trial_type.Description: Whether the response (ink color) matches the printed word. (TrialType in eprime output).

Levels.Con: Congruent. Printed word is same as the ink color. Low cognitive control demands.
Levels.InCon: Incongruent. Printed word is different than the ink color. High cognitive control demands.

trial_lwpc.Description: List-wise proportion congruency assignment of this trial. (LWPC in eprime output).

Levels.PC50: 0.5 proportion congruent color: red, blue, white, or purple.
Levels.MC: mostly congruent color: pink, green, black, or yellow

response_time.Description: Time between start of audio recording (Stimulus appearance) and spoken response, as measured by https://github.com/ccplabwustl/dualmechanisms/tree/master/preparationsAndConversions/audio. Not in the eprime output.

response_accuracy.Description: If the response was correct, as determined by two people listening to each recording. Not in the eprime output.
